name: The Slot
description:
Introduction

A lovely nontechnical canyon with mudstone and conglomerate walls reminiscent of Death Valley and NV canyons.

Approach

The trail from the parking lot is brief, and the canyon begins almost immediately.

Descent

Walk until the canyon begins to widen and become less interesting. Then return back the way you came.

Exit

Red tape

Beta sites

  • AmericanSouthwest.net : The Slot; Anza Borrego Desert State Park; California
